channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: No street lights in the whole Highwood Avenue, 1st March
item.description:
The whole of Highwood Avenue is in the datk for the second night
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Highwood Avenue, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: THIS IS DANGEROUS Metal sign saying, I think, Ice' is half on the carriageway. You have to swerve to avoid it., 1st March
item.description:
Just before turning to Dowdeswell off A40 On left verge going towards Cheltenham.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Cotswold

item.category: Sign plate is missing (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Deep pothole now causing cars to 'crash ' down and a hazard to cyclists and horses, 1st March
item.description:
In Dark Lane travelling towards Little Shurdington just beyond Shepton Cottage garage and just beyond field gate on left hand side.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dark Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple Potholes with serious potential to cause damage to cars., 1st March
item.description:
The Harp Hill Road is an absolute wreck. You are just about able to drive 20mph safely, due to all the pot holes on the sides of the road, cars pull into the middle and this will result in an accident sooner or later. The state of road is seriously unsafe for drivers and cyclists. This needs to be investigated.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights 4 & 5 led street lights out of order on footpath between Salvia Close and Cheltenham Road East, 1st March
item.description:
Street lights 4 & 5 led street lights out of order on footpath between Salvia Close and Cheltenham Road East, been out at least a week, 1 cyclist has been injured due to hitting dustbin in the dark
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Salvia Close, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Big pothole near junction with court road., 1st March
item.description:
Quite deep and wide pothole at entrance to hurcombe way from court road. Been there at least a week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Hurcombe Way, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole on Leckhampton Hill, near Springwood, 1st March
item.description:
There is a large pothole on Leckhampton Hill, approximately 15 inches long, 10 inches wide, and nearly as deep as a tennis ball. It is just before Springwood, in the left lane when traveling away from Cheltenham. The pothole is deep enough to pose a serious risk to vehicles, it has already caused damage to my vehicle, resulting in a bent rim and flat tyre.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Hill, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streets lights out, 1st March
item.description:
Street lights are out by the Cheltenham Society of Model Engineers. This is particularly dangerous as there is a very wide, long and deep pothole (reported) in this area, and new calming measures have been installed that are difficult to see in the dark.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
